survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Online Banking Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on the user experience and satisfaction levels with online banking services to enhance service quality and customer engagement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall online banking experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for capturing nuanced feedback.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall online banking experience?

questions.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently in our online banking platform? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select options to capture feature usage patterns.

script.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently in our online banking platform? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our online banking platform?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our online banking platform?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our online banking services to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard NPS scale for measuring advocacy.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our online banking services to others?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues while using our online banking platform in the past month?
questions.client_notes: Binary question to identify technical pain points.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues while using our online banking platform in the past month?
